pubinfo.publish: Minnesota DNR - Division of Fish & Wildlife - Fisheries Unit

descript.abstract: This layer shows legally designated trout lakes as identified in Minnesota Rules Chapter 6264.0050. These are inland lakes managed by DNR Fisheries for trout species (not including lake trout). In order to protect and foster the propagation of trout species, several restrictions on fishing in these lakes apply. See MN Rules 6264.0050 http://www.revisor.leg.state.mn.us/arule/6264/0050.html for legal descriptions and restrictions associated with designated trout waters. For more information about lakes managed for trout species, see the following: Trout Lakes: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/fishing/trout_lakes/index.html Trout Lakes List (list of trout species x lake): http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/fishing/trout_lakes/list.html Note: In addition to Designated Trout Lakes, Stream Trout Lakes are specifically managed for stream trout species (i.e., rainbow trout, brook trout, brown trout and splake), although they are not an official designation in MN Rules. See Stream Trout Lakes.
descript.purpose: To support planning, fisheries management, research and other resource-related activities with impact on stream trout lakes. Also supports recreational identification of these resources.

theme.themekey: inlandWaters, designated trout lakes, lake trout

timeperd.current: Re-delineations and edits are frequent and occur as needed. See the attributes DELINEATON_DATE and DELINEATION_SRC for date and source of each polygon. See CONTENT_DATE for last date of attribute updates.

citeinfo.title: DNR Hydrography - Lakes and Open Water Stream Trout Lakes

procstep.procdesc: Attributes began with USGS DLG source data and in 2003-2004 were reviewed and updated where possible by DNR Fisheries GIS staff. The lake polygons are derived from the Open Water feature class of the DNR Hydrography SDE Dataset. See Associated Data Sets above.

horizpa.horizpar: Polygons have been improved by on-screen digitizing over DOQ and FSA imagery.

attr.attrdef: Unique GIS record number of waterbody features in DNR Hydrography SDE - Open Water Features

A unique Fisheries Waterbody ID for joining/linking polygons to DNR Fisheries Lake Survey DB (Oracle). FW_IDs are assigned based on how the waterbody is managed by DNR Fisheries (i.e., an FW_ID may correspond to an entire basin '00' or to a specific sub-basin '01','02',etc.

edom.edomvd: A "dummy" Fisheries Waterbody ID representing an alternate representation of a basin (implemented in SDE Dataset only)
A "dummy" Fisheries Waterbody ID representing a non-MN portion of a border water

attr.attrdef: Waterbody ID per DNR Ecological and Water Resources (EWR) Division's LAKESDB database; the DOWLKNUM may end in"00" (entire basin) or "01","02", etc. (sub-basin)
Public Water (Lake) Name per DNR Ecological and Water Resources Division's LAKESDB database
Identifies whether basin is a sub-basin of a larger complex of basins

edom.edomvd: Yes, is a sub-basin; DOWLKNUM usually ends in '01', '02, '03, etc.
No, is not a sub-basin; DOWLKNUM usually ends in '01', '02, '03, etc.

attr.attrdef: Hydrologic feature type; based on original USCLASS attribute from USGS 100K DLG dataset; some polygons have been reclassified to better indicate their current hydrologic state
Lake Class per DNR Fisheries Investigational Report #417 - Schupp 1992 http://files.dnr.state.mn.us/publications/fisheries/investigational_reports/417.pdf
Surface area of waterbody in acres
Perimeter of shoreline in miles (includes island shoreline)
UTM Easting (X) of waterbody center
UTM Northing (Y) of waterbody center
County Name
DNR Administrative Region
DNR Fisheries Administrative Areas (Fisheries Office)
Identifies border waters

edom.edomvd: Polygon (portion of border lake) that is outside of MN
Lake is not a border lake (outside of MN)

attr.attrdef: Person/unit/source of polygon delineation
Date of polygon delineation or shape update.
Photo imagery source used for digitizing polygon feature

edom.edomvd: Public Water (PWI) polygon representing the Ordinary High Water Level (OHWL)

attr.attrdef: Any notes related to the delineation.
Date the lake polygon source layer was re-published following updates.
Flag indicating whether the lake is a designated trout lake.

edom.edomvd: Yes, the lake is a designated trout lake
No, the lake is not a designated trout lake

attr.attrdef: Date the layer-specific attributes were last updated

overview.eaover: The first set of attributes (DNR_HYDRO_ID through PUBLISH_DATE) are derived from and consistent with the Open Water feature class of the DNR Hydrography SDE Dataset. See DNR Hydrography - Lakes and Open Water. The remaining attributes are specific to this layer.

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html
